thread.title: Fantastic location service and views
thread.title_full: Fantastic location service and views - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: PC7368
title: Fantastic location service and views
text: Visited April 2016 and had a times square view room which was fantastic. Decent size comfortable room with great view. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Great location with easy access to many subway stations ... not right in the heart of times square which is nice , an easy walk to central park and times square. Be back next month
